value:
Brother... I will fix things. So wait
for me...

My brother gave me this tome. The
cover is worn, but I treasure it.

As your general, I will see your
foes defeated... I'll snap their
heads off, like so many dolls.

Líf and I have fought together
for some time now. We share
a bond.

Do not address me as Veronica. I
am not her. My world, my destiny...
they are likewise not hers.$k$pI am Thrasir.

I am Thrasir, general of the realm
of the dead. Well, no...a general of
$Nf's forces now.
Should I be pleased?
My world may be in ruin, but I persist.
What? Have you something to say?
I thank you.

I am Thrasir. The one who called
me here... It was you, wasn't it?

My world was destroyed... And my
battle was lost. My hope is gone.$k$pOr so I had thought. Your presence
makes the fantastical seem real.$k$pSome day, perhaps, my brother...
You...$k$pI know that even you cannot save a
world that has fallen to ruin.$k$pI know that...$k$pBut I can't help but cling to my selfish
wishes. Do not let it trouble you.
はっ
死んで
きゃああっ！
やったわね…
All will perish.
Weak.
Don't get in my way.
Won't you just die?
I can't die!
ふふ…
You're always spending your time with me. What do you get out of it?
What was that? Is that how you greet people in the Order of Heroes?
Prince Alfonse is here. So is Princess Sherena. No...no, never mind. It's nothing.
Princess Veronica is a foolish child. She is far beyond help.
You must know that I am your enemy. Why are you so kind?
Even if it would cost me my life, I want to save my brother.
I am your enemy. So—why? Why are my feelings... Why now?
All right.
What?
Death is the end.
